snippet.title: Azoove Announcement Video
snippet.description:
Embark on a dangerous crossing of the Azoove desert in this co-op survival card game. Heroes must manage resources and work together to survive the journey and return a cursed book to the Library. With the fate of your village at stake, can you make it in time to seal the Devil Ur'gan?

Work together with your allies to manage your resources, keep despair and disorder low and bless your path to victory.

If you wish to survive the journey, wishlist us on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2435450/Azoove/

Engage with our growing community on discord! 


#videogametrailer #videogametrailers2023 #videogametrailersnew #survivalgame #survivalgames #survivalgamespc
